thread.title: Awesome Location in the middle of Everything!
thread.title_full: Awesome Location in the middle of Everything! - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mirvin3
title: Awesome Location in the middle of Everything!
text: Just got back from NYC and this was our first time staying at this hotel. And I must say that we really liked it ... right in the middle of all things SoHo. We walked for miles and enjoyed some of the best of NYC. The staff at the hotel are so welcoming and helpful ... Very nice touch!!!
